articles.summary: Meta AI has been integrated into WhatsApp. It initiates conversations with a hidden system prompt. System prompts are the initial instructions given to an AI model that shape its responses and persona throughout a conversation. They are a fundamental aspect of how conversational AIs are designed to function.

articles.title: New AI architecture delivers 100x faster reasoning than LLMs with just 1,000 training examples
articles.summary: Singapore-based AI startup has created a new architecture for slow, deliberate planning and fast, intuitive computation. It could have important implications for enterprise AI applications where data is scarce and resources are limited.
